subject: Refund Order #SSN2548
description_text:
I never received the pedals. I only received the linear motors.

I would like my money back.

What is next step?

Thanks

Earl

conversations.body_text: Hi Earl Snider,     We apologise for the delay caused. Your parcel will be delivered within the next couple of days. https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/?trknbr=884470137425&trkqual=12029~884470137425~FDEG

I was told the same thing last week and nothing.








Thanks

Earl

On Wed, Sep 24, 2025, 3:10 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Earl Snider,    We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We will refund the additional shipping charges as compensation. I see that the tracking updates have not stopped. It may simply take longer for the shipment to arrive at your address from our California warehouse.

Ok.
If it is delivered in the next day or two I'll accept the shipping refund

Thanks

Earl

On Wed, Sep 24, 2025, 3:28 AM service@simsonn.com
